root.name: Arcana Famiglia: Yūreisen no Majutsushi
root.description: OverviewArcana Famiglia: Yūreisen no Majutsushi (アルカナ・ファミリア 幽霊船の魔術師) has a similar plot to its predecessor with the addition of new two male characters: Ash and Joshua. It is developed by HuneX and produced by Comfort. It is released in Japan on the PlayStation Portable on June 21, 2012.PlotUnknown.CharactersGame PlayOther MediaSame as La Storia della Arcana Famiglia.
